humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, multiple right axillary sentinel lymph nodes were excised and found to be negative for metastatic carcinoma (AJCC pNO (i-) (sn)). This information aligns with New Rule 11 and New Rule 10, which state that N0 can indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes, or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that multiple right axillary sentinel lymph nodes were excised and were negative for metastatic carcinoma (AJCC pNO (i-) (sn)). This indicates that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage.
